           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/alexandra-tolstoy-oxfordshire-cottage-archive-story">

         <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
          <article class="c-card c-card--top-stories">
           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/londons-best-outdoor-drinking">
            London's best outdoor drinking spots
           </a>
           <div class="c-card__obj">
            <div class="c-card__obj__header">
             <div class="c-card__images">
              <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">

          <article class="c-card c-card--top-stories">
           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/summer-house-decoration-ideas">
            How to decorate a holiday home according to some of the design world's most stylish
           </a>
           <div class="c-card__obj">
            <div class="c-card__obj__header">
             <div class="c-card__images">
              <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">
               <img alt="Jacques Grange's Shell Curtain - Holiday Cottages" class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zmrjem63x7A/crop/200/square/f/086018-013-house-27apr15_NicholasMatheus_b.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zmrjem63x7A/crop/200/square/f/086018-013-house-27apr15_NicholasMatheus_b.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zmrjem63x7A/crop/300/square/f/086018-013-house-27apr15_NicholasMatheus_b.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zmrjem63x7A/crop/400/square/f/086018-013-house-27apr15_NicholasMatheus_b.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zmrjem63x7A/crop/600/square/f/086018-013-house-27apr15_NicholasMatheus_b.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>

           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/article/david-attenborough-and-the-queen">

           </a>

         <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
          <article class="c-card c-card--top-stories">
           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/article/claybrook-tiles">
            A new tile company from the minds behind-Fired Earth
           </a>
           <div class="c-card__obj">
            <div class="c-card__obj__header">
             <div class="c-card__images">
              <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">
               <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/4e1gQx7x9Zx/crop/200/square/f/2017_12_05_flatlay_277.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/4e1gQx7x9Zx/crop/200/square/f/2017_12_05_flatlay_277.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/4e1gQx7x9Zx/crop/300/square/f/2017_12_05_flatlay_277.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/4e1gQx7x9Zx/crop/400/square/f/2017_12_05_flatlay_277.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/4e1gQx7x9Zx/crop/600/square/f/2017_12_05_flatlay_277.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>

           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/emma-burns-converted-stable-block">

          <article class="c-card c-card--top-stories">
           <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/article/adam-bray-london-flat">
            A London flat by Adam Bray full of rich colour and texture
           </a>
           <div class="c-card__obj">
            <div class="c-card__obj__header">
             <div class="c-card__images">
              <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        The House &amp; Garden Festival 2018
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Decorated Spaces at The House &amp; Garden Festival: Edward Bulmer's elegant drawing room
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        The House &amp; Garden Festival is on at Olympia June 20-24. We're especially excited to see the rooms decorated for us by two of our favourite designers, Rachel Chudley and Edward Bulmer, and here we take a look at Edward Bulmer's country house style.
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         8:00 AM
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         8 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>

  <section class="c-card-section c-card-section--c-tag">
   <div class="c-card-section__constrain">
    <div class="c-card-section__title-wrapper">
     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">
      <span>
       <a href="/topic/the-house-garden-festival-2018">
        The House &amp; Garden Festival 2018
       </a>
      </span>
     </h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="global__list-reset c-card-list js-c-card-list c-card-list--c-tag">
     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
      <article class="c-card c-card--switcher">
       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/house-and-garden-festival-2018-meet-the-designers-edward-bulmer">
        Decorated Spaces at The House &amp; Garden Festival: Edward Bulmer's elegant drawing room
       </a>
       <div class="c-card__obj">
        <div class="c-card__obj__header">
         <div class="c-card__images">

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        5 summer decorating ideas
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A shoppable scheme of summer decorating ideas curated by House &amp; Garden editors
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Inspired by the great outdoors, decoration director Gabby Deeming dreams up pretty schemes for summer.
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         7:00 AM
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         5 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           Our favourite one-Pot Recipes
          </p>

            Spiced prawn and pea ragout
           </span>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        City
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Event designer David Stark and his artist husband Migguel Anggelo's quietly theatrical Brooklyn apartment
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Event designer David Stark and his artist husband Migguel Anggelo have reconfigured their Brooklyn apartment with theatrical objects and unexpected finishes.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Lucie Young
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         22 Aug 2017
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         15 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Victorian Houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Designer Audrey Carden's transformation of her London house
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Interior designer Audrey Carden transformed her London house in just nine months, adding clever architectural features and bold decoration schemes.
       </span>
      </p>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Lifestyle
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The family who left London behind for a new life in Provence making rosÃ©
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Stephen and Jeany Cronk have left London behind and built a welcoming family house in a ProvenÃ§al village, where they have fulfilled their dream of becoming successful winemakers.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Dominic Bradbury
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         15 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         17 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

  <section class="c-superfeature">
   <div class="c-superfeature-wrapper">
    <a class="c-superfeature__link" href="http://www.houseandgarden.co.uk/gallery/gardens-of-mothecombe-house-in-devon">
     In a hidden corner of Devon, a valley garden sloping through trees and wildflowers towards the sea
    </a>
    <div class="c-superfeature__images">
     <div class="c-superfeature__images-wrapper">
      <div class="c-superfeature__image">
       <div class="c-superfeature__image-wrapper">
        <picture>
         <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none"><![endif]-->

          <img class="global__image " src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/lNQ2mAG2BlQ/crop/405/0.6666666666666666/f/mothecombe_2017_0601-110033x.jpg"/>
         </picture>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Country Gardens
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        In a hidden corner of Devon, a valley garden sloping through trees and wildflowers towards the sea
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        The coastal gardens of Mothecombe House in Devon have been tended and adapted by the same family since the nineteenth century, resulting in their current incarnation as a sanctuary for bees, butterflies and other insects
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Clare Foster
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         15 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         7 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">

      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Small spaces, big ideas. It's time to transform your tiny garden
       </span>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Houses by our Top 100 Interior Designers
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The elegant vicarage of the couple behind one the UK's cult lighting brands
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        On the site of a former vicarage in Hampshire, Andrew and Sarah Hills of Porta Romana have created an elegant and distinguished family house, which has an established feel despite its modern reconstruction.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Jennifer Goulding
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         14 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         10 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           Thai &amp; South-East Asian recipes
          </p>

      <div class="c-superfeature__image">
       <div class="c-superfeature__image-wrapper">
        <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KlLPyA1rgEl/crop/405/portrait/f/aj_529_1056-copy-house-5mar18-alexander-james_b.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KlLPyA1rgEl/crop/405/portrait/f/aj_529_1056-copy-house-5mar18-alexander-james_b.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KlLPyA1rgEl/crop/810/portrait/f/aj_529_1056-copy-house-5mar18-alexander-james_b.jpg 810w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
        <noscript>
         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KlLPyA1rgEl/crop/405/portrait/f/aj_529_1056-copy-house-5mar18-alexander-james_b.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Edwardian
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        An Edwardian villa by the architect William Smalley, imbued with his brand of quiet beauty
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Architect William Smalley has transformed this Edwardian villa into a modern family house that delights its owner by opening up spaces and working with a palette of natural colours and materials
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Christopher Stocks
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         12 Mar 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         14 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

   <div class="c-superfeature-wrapper">
    <a class="c-superfeature__link" href="http://www.houseandgarden.co.uk/gallery/bold-london-house-art-collector">

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Art collector and patron Valeria Napoleone's home is a gallery space for the female artists she champions
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Art collector and patron Valeria Napoleone has been buying work by female artists since the Nineties and zealously helping to raise their profile
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Emily Tobin
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         9 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Furniture &amp; accessories
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A shoppable scheme of acid brights and oriental pattern curated by our decoration editors
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        This month deputy decoration editor Ruth Sleightholme creates a vivid scheme of acid brights, distinctive furniture and Oriental-influenced accents.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Ruth Sleightholme
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         11 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>

        </div>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Victorian Houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The characterful East London townhouse of Melissa Hemsley and her art curator boyfriend
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Chef and food writer Melissa Hemsley and her art curator boyfriend have transformed a Victorian townhouse into a friendly and functional home
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Alice Riley-Smith
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         06 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         14 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

    </a>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Decoration
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Style File: Retrouvius
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        A potent cocktail of reclaimed and modern, interior designers Retrouvius have a style we covet.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">

     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Destinations
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The magic of Rhode Island, Nantucket and Cape Cod
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Mary Lussiana steps back in time to Americaâs Gilded Age on a trip round Rhode Island, Nantucket and Cape Cod
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Mary Lussiana
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         04 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         9 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

       <span>
        Design Ideas
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        In honour of the V&amp;A Frida Kahlo exhibition - why Mexican style is a look for now
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Colourful, bohemian, rustic - the modern houses of Mexico
       </span>

       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/gallery/bold-london-house-art-collector">

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        City Gardens
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Curator and potter Joanna Bird has turned her garden into an lush exhibition space
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        With the help of Simon Irvine, curator and potter Joanna Bird has turned her garden into an exhibition space, where modern sculpted ceramics meet calming evergreens
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Francesca Ryan
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         05 Jun 2018
        </span>
       </li>

         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/6OKop1KGyJz/crop/405/portrait/f/180131_top_designer_jane_ormsby_gore-hires-print03x.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="c-superfeature__image">

      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        House &amp; Garden's Top 100 Interior Designers
       </span>
      </p>

      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Our definitive annual list of the best interior designers in the UK, encompassing all styles from traditional to modern, bold and colourful to sleek and minimal, and everything in between.

        How to spend a weekend in the Ile de RÃ©

       <span>
        Stephanie Drax recommends the best places to stay, eat, shop and explore on the Atlantic-coast island

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Destinations
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Famous film and TV locations you can visit in the UK
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Great Britain is famous for its grand castles, stately homes and pretty villages - perfect settings for period dramas, and some have become the most iconic film locations in the UK, from Harry Potter's Alnwick Castle to Pride and Prejudice's Chatsworth
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         30 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         10 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

           </svg>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Design Ideas
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        How to choose decorative mouldings &amp; architectural details
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        From ornate stucco work ceilings to pared back cornices and skirting, decorative mouldings take various forms and really can make or break a room.
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         30 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         12 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
     </li>
    </ul>
    <div class="global__a--center">
     <a class="c-card-section__btn " href="/recipe/collection/recipes-from-great-dixter">
      View More
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Inside Jackalope, the most avant-garde hotel in Melbourne
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Combining darkly dramatic decoration and cult industrial design with the magical setting of Australiaâs Mornington Peninsula, Jackalope is bringing a dose of the avant-garde to Melbourne
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">

       </span>

          </div>
         </div>

        <div class="c-card__obj__body">

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Houses by our Top 100 Interior Designers
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Martin Hulbert's scheme, inspired by spring time in a Japanese forest, for a charming 1830s house
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Beginning with a limited brief for his decoration of this house in London, Martin Hulbert encouraged the owners to broaden their horizons and embrace detail and a wider colour palette.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Elfreda Pownall
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         29 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         8 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

       </span>

       </span>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Chelsea Flower Show 2018
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        House &amp; Garden's highlights from the RHS Chelsea Flower Show 2018
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Our top five highlights - one from each area - at the Chelsea Flower Show 2018, including Sarah Price's Mediterranean garden, a Somerset nursery and a Japanese hospitality garden
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Caroline Beck
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         20 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        At home in Wales with Sarah Price, the young gardener who is the talk of the Chelsea Flower Show
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Clare Foster visits garden designer Sarah Price at her family house in Wales, where she is bringing a Victorian walled garden back to life
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Clare Foster
       </span>

      <div class="c-superfeature__image">

        <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/RL4lpzdAOLV/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_207og.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/RL4lpzdAOLV/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_207og.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/RL4lpzdAOLV/crop/810/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_207og.jpg 810w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
        <noscript>
         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/RL4lpzdAOLV/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_207og.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="c-superfeature__image">
       <div class="c-superfeature__image-wrapper">
        <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zEbQrlA2VjM/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_035og2.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zEbQrlA2VjM/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_035og2.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zEbQrlA2VjM/crop/810/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_035og2.jpg 810w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>

         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/zEbQrlA2VjM/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_035og2.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="c-superfeature__image">
       <div class="c-superfeature__image-wrapper">
        <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/6jpWdvdyoVe/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_155.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/6jpWdvdyoVe/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_155.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/6jpWdvdyoVe/crop/810/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_155.jpg 810w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>

         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/6jpWdvdyoVe/crop/405/portrait/f/massey_hg_pentreath_155.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Houses by our Top 100 Interior Designers
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The Duke &amp; Duchess of Cambridge's interior designer Ben Pentreath turns his hand to an Arts and Crafts house
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Designer Ben Pentreath has given each room in this reconfigured Arts and Crafts house its own personality, combining colour and texture with interesting pieces from different periods.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Elfreda Pownall
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         23 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         12 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        City
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A 19th century mansion beautifully modernised by Rabih Hage
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        After 10 years in this house in west London, the owners enlisted the help of designer and architect Rabih Hage to reconfigure the layout and redecorate the rooms to reflect changes in their needs and aesthetic sensibility
       </span>
      </p>

    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Kitchen
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Three fresh, shoppable kitchen schemes created by House &amp; Garden editors
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        This month deputy decoration editor Ruth Sleightholme curates three fresh looks for the kitchen.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Ruth Sleightholme
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         14 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         5 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

   <div class="c-card-section__constrain">
    <div class="c-card-section__title-wrapper">
     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">
      <span>
       <a href="/recipe/collection/claire-ptak-recipes">
        A special menu of modern American recipes by Claire Ptak of Violet Cakes, the woman behind the Royal wedding cake
       </a>
      </span>
     </h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="global__list-reset c-card-list js-c-card-list c-card-list--c-tag">
     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
      <article class="c-card c-card--switcher">
       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/recipe/cabbage-coleslaw-recipe">
        Claire Ptak's caraway coleslaw
       </a>
       <div class="c-card__obj">
        <div class="c-card__obj__header">
         <div class="c-card__images">
          <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">
           <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/200/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/200/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/300/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/400/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/600/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
           <noscript>
            <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/85Y45Klv490/crop/200/square/f/housegarden_americancomfort_feb_5366-house-6feb18-chris-tonnesen.jpg"/>
           </noscript>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           A special menu of modern American recipes by Claire Ptak of Violet Cakes, the woman behind the Royal wedding cake
          </p>
          <h3 class="c-card__title">
           <span>
            Claire Ptak's caraway coleslaw
           </span>
          </h3>
          <hr class="c-card__separator"/>
         </div>

      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Inside the House &amp; Garden Archive
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        From the archive: David Hockney's Flat (1969)
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        We revisit our May 1969 story on the home of a young artist called David Hockney'
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         13 Feb 2017
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Destinations
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The most beautiful beaches in the world
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        From a sublime stretch of remote Scottish coastline to the euphoria-inducing sands of Tulum in Mexico, these breathtaking beaches are alone worth the journey
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         16 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>

        <span class="">
         27 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>

     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">

     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
      <article class="c-card c-card--switcher">
       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/recipe/giant-couscous-butternut-squash">
        Giant couscous with butternut squash &amp; herbs
       </a>
       <div class="c-card__obj">
        <div class="c-card__obj__header">
         <div class="c-card__images">
          <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">
           <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/JmEpeRZK925/crop/200/square/f/Recipes8_EL_6sep12_pr_b.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/JmEpeRZK925/crop/200/square/f/Recipes8_EL_6sep12_pr_b.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/JmEpeRZK925/crop/300/square/f/Recipes8_EL_6sep12_pr_b.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/JmEpeRZK925/crop/400/square/f/Recipes8_EL_6sep12_pr_b.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/JmEpeRZK925/crop/600/square/f/Recipes8_EL_6sep12_pr_b.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>

           </noscript>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           100 healthy recipes
          </p>
          <h3 class="c-card__title">
           <span>
            Giant couscous with butternut squash &amp; herbs
           </span>
          </h3>
          <hr class="c-card__separator"/>
         </div>
         <div class="c-card__footer">
          <ul class="global__list-reset c-card__meta ">
           <li class="c-card__meta-item c-card__meta-item--date">
            <span class="">
             2 days ago
            </span>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
     </li>
     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">

         <source data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/405/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/810/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 810w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1020/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1020w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1440/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1440w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1620/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1620w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/2040/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 2040w" media="(min-width: 0px)">
         </source>
         <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]-->
         <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/405/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
        </picture>
        <noscript>
         <picture>
          <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none"><![endif]-->
          <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/405/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/810/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 810w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1020/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 1020w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1440/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 1440w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1620/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 1620w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/2040/0.4166666666666667/f/2329613.jpg 2040w">
          </source>
          <source media="(min-width: 0px)" srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/405/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 405w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/810/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 810w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1020/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1020w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1440/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1440w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/1620/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 1620w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/2040/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg 2040w">
          </source>
          <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]-->
          <img class="global__image " src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/ZY5Gk4dwLQ9/crop/405/0.6666666666666666/f/2329613.jpg"/>
         </picture>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        British Houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The home of the founders of iconic Pimlico Road shop Jamb is every bit as wonderful as you'd expect
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Liz Elliot meets antiques dealer Will Fisher, the founder of Jamb in Pimlico Road, a quintessentially British company, which he now runs together with his wife, Charlotte, selling antiques and beautifully made reproductions.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Liz Elliot
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         11 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         24 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

  <section class="c-card-section c-card-section--c-tag">
   <div class="c-card-section__constrain">
    <div class="c-card-section__title-wrapper">
     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">
      <span>
       <a href="/topic/time-to-rethink">
        Time To Rethink: resuscitating our favourite neglected decorative elements
       </a>
      </span>
     </h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="global__list-reset c-card-list js-c-card-list c-card-list--c-tag">

       </span>

       <span>
        Growing Cut Flowers Part 3: growing roses for scent and colour
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Clare Foster continues her series on the cutting garden, focusing this month on growing a variety of roses for scent and colour, with advice from Green and Gorgeous flower farmer Rachel Siegfried
       </span>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Country Gardens
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        The 800-year-old estate of a Sicilian marquis with evolving displays of succulents and tropical flowers
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        At San Giuliano, the 800-year-old estate of a Sicilian marquis, evolving displays of succulents and tropical flowers ensure the garden always feels beguiling and alive.
       </span>
      </p>

   <div class="c-card-section__constrain">
    <div class="c-card-section__title-wrapper">
     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">
      <span>
       <a href="/recipe/collection/easy-cocktail-recipes">
        Extremely easy cocktail recipes
       </a>
      </span>
     </h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="global__list-reset c-card-list js-c-card-list c-card-list--c-tag">
     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">
      <article class="c-card c-card--switcher">
       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/recipe/aperol-spritz">
        How to make the perfect Aperol Spritz
       </a>
       <div class="c-card__obj">
        <div class="c-card__obj__header">
         <div class="c-card__images">
          <div class="c-card__image c-card__image--square ">
           <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/200/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/200/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/300/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/400/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/600/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
           <noscript>
            <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/KO4XQDyXEmP/crop/200/square/f/aperol-spritz-easy-living-5july13_bt.jpg"/>
           </noscript>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        London Houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        House &amp; Garden 2018 Project of the Year: A London house with an exquisite art collection designed by Shalini Misra
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        This Victorian house in London was almost doubled in size to make room for its ownersâ dramatic collection of contemporary art, with architect and designer Shalini Misra creating detailed yet large-scale spaces that allow the art to shine.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Nonie Niesewand
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         02 May 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         11 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Hotels
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Beaverbrook is arguably England's most beautiful new hotel
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Susie Atkinson has turned her experienced hand to the interiors of Beaverbrook, Surrey, imbuing the rooms with a romance and style that pays tribute to its glamorous history.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">

      <article class="c-card c-card--switcher">
       <a class="c-card__link c-card__link--article " href="/recipe/monkfish-curry-recipe">
        Monkfish curry recipe
       </a>
       <div class="c-card__obj">
        <div class="c-card__obj__header">

        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           100 healthy recipes

          <h3 class="c-card__title">
           <span>
            Monkfish curry recipe
           </span>
          </h3>
          <hr class="c-card__separator"/>

  <section class="c-card-section c-card-section--c-tag">
   <div class="c-card-section__constrain">
    <div class="c-card-section__title-wrapper">
     <h3 class="c-card-section__title">
      <span>
       <a href="/recipe/collection/modern-moroccan-recipes">
        Souk it up: Modern Moroccan Recipes
       </a>
      </span>
     </h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="global__list-reset c-card-list js-c-card-list c-card-list--c-tag">
     <li class="c-card-list__item js-c-card-list__item ">

       <span>
        Design Ideas
       </span>

      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        How to use zellige tiles, inspired by HermÃ¨s
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        When HermÃ¨s covered the walls of their Salone installation in zellige tiles, it made us want to follow suit. We've gathered some beautiful zellige-tiled kitchens and bathrooms for inspiration in how to use them.
       </span>
      </p>

        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           5 summer decorating ideas
          </p>
          <h3 class="c-card__title">
           <span>
            A shoppable scheme of summer decorating ideas curated by House &amp; Garden editors
           </span>
          </h3>
          <hr class="c-card__separator"/>

         <div class="c-card__images">

           <img class="global__image img-lazyload " data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/200/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg" data-srcset="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/200/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg 200w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/300/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg 300w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/400/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg 400w, https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/600/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg 600w" src="/static/img/tiny.gif"/>
           <noscript>
            <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/E50Pxd4V2Kr/crop/200/square/f/ALB-PLAN1-house-27sep16-Viola-Lanari_b.jpg"/>
           </noscript>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-card__obj__body">
         <div class="c-card__header">
          <p class="c-card__tag">
           Planting Advice
          </p>
          <h3 class="c-card__title">
           <span>
            The Arabella Lennox-Boyd Border
           </span>
          </h3>
          <hr class="c-card__separator"/>
         </div>

    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Coastal houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A couple who ditched the London art scene for a simpler life in Greece
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Photographer and designer Claire Lloyd and her partner, artist Matthew Usmar Lauder, ditched the London arts scene in 2007. In search of a simpler life they moved to a small village on the Greek island of Lesvos.
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         06 Apr 2018
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Furniture &amp; accessories
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        Decorative ornaments are back. Here's where to get them from.
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        Ornaments should be an integral part of your interior design. What's a cake without frosting, after all? These beautiful, colourful objects are the way to impress your personality on a room, whether you prefer whimsical quirk or classical elegance.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Charlie Porter
       </span>
      </p>
      <ul class="c-superfeature__meta">
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--date">
        <span class="">
         05 Apr 2018
        </span>
       </li>
       <li class="c-superfeature__meta-item c-superfeature__meta-item--gallery">
        <span class="">
         4 items
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </section>

         <img class="" src="https://hg-images.condecdn.net/image/q2xvwBM6LZl/crop/405/portrait/f/black_isle_bronze_hg_2156-house-3mar18-greg-funnell_b.jpg"/>
        </noscript>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="c-superfeature__contents">
     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Houses belonging to interesting people
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A medieval Highland castle and foundry, bought for Â£5,000 by pop artist Gerald Laing, is being kept alive by his son
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        As the son of the celebrated artist and sculptor Gerald Laing, Farquhar Ogilvie-Laing is ensuring his familyâs legacy lives on, both in the Highland castle home his father saved from ruin and through his prosperous bronze foundry
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By
       </span>
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-name">
        Charlotte Fairbairn
       </span>
      </p>

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Coastal houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A bamboo beach house in Mustique designed by Veere Grenney
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        On the Caribbean island of Mustique, interior designer Veere Grenney has redesigned a bamboo house that is a study in neutrals and natural materials, set off by the green of the palms outside and the glorious blue of the ocean.
       </span>
      </p>
      <p class="c-superfeature__byline">
       <span class="c-superfeature__byline-prefix">
        By

     <div class="c-superfeature__contents-wrapper">
      <p class="c-superfeature__tag">
       <span>
        Coastal houses
       </span>
      </p>
      <h3 class="c-superfeature__title">
       <span>
        A Bahamas beach house designed by John McCall and inspired by Valentino's yacht
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="c-superfeature__teaser">
       <span>
        A Bahamas beach house inspired by Valentino's yach. Interior designer John McCall was enlisted to create a house with British sensibility and not 'too beachy'.
       </span>
      </p>

                            }
